author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this fireside chat with Kasper Weber, CEO & Co-Founder of Beyond Creative.

Beyond Creative is one of the most featured studios creating games in the Fortnite ecosystem today. The team creates brand game experiences in Fortnite for the likes of LEGO, Honda, Ralph Lauren, the NFL, and more. 

In this video, Epic’s Miles Perkins catches up with Kasper on his journey from experimenting with Fortnite Creative in the early days to developing a fully fledged studio dedicated to creating top-tier games in Fortnite using Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN).

The pair discusses building creative careers, making engaging digital experiences, and how gaming is the new frontier for storytelling and brand connection.

Find out more about creating games with UEFN here: unrealengine.com/uses/uefn-unreal-editor-for-fortnite

#KasperWeber, #BeyondCreative, #Fortnite, #UEFN, #UnrealEditorForFortnite, #FortniteCreative
title: Fireside Chat with Kasper Weber, CEO & Co-Founder of Beyond Creative

author: Unreal Engine
description: Fab is now available in the Epic Games Launcher, making it faster and more convenient to grab Fab marketplace content for your projects. Access Fab’s entire library of diverse assets—and all of your Fab acquisitions—without having to leave the Launcher. We've brought on some of the team to demo how Fab works from the launcher & get you started!
title: Fab in Launcher Overview | Inside Unreal

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video from the ‘Motion Design in Unreal Engine’ series, in which Nick Jushchyshyn (AKA Pixel Prof) explores the creation of full screen motion graphics in UE 5.6.

You’ll get a look at how to:

Select the required graphics layout (‘top few’ or ‘roster’)
Adjust the shape, colors, and size of the graphics
Add secondary graphics, logos, text, and animation

Don’t miss the next instalment of this Motion Design tutorial series! To learn more about Motion Design in Unreal Engine, check out the Epic Developer Community: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/motion-design-in-unreal-engine

#MotionDesign, #FullScreenGraphics, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #PixelProf
title: Motion Design in Unreal Engine, Episode 07: Full Screen Graphics

author: Unreal Engine
description:
From dancers to dancing robots, from food & beverage to humanitarian organizations, from explainers to narrative-driven commercials — these projects show how product storytelling with real-time technology can take many forms. 

These product cinematics were created during the first Unreal Fellowship: Product Storytelling at Epic Games Novi Sad, a program designed to explore new ways of using Unreal Engine and MetaHuman technology in advertising and communication. 

This sizzle reel brings together the work of twelve Fellows, highlighting both their creativity and the learning journey behind it.
title: Unreal Fellowship: Product Storytelling I Sizzle Reel - May, 2025
